ingredients.ingredient: ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Remove all white pith from blood oranges for cleaner appearance
Let salad sit 10 minutes before serving to develop flavors
Drizzle oil just before serving to prevent wilting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple Sicilian salad celebrates the unique flavor of blood oranges. What other citrus varieties could you substitute?
